name: 1Hive Water
additional_notices: Kindly be aware of liquidity-related risks. This notice is not directed at any project in particular, and is more of a cautionary reminder.

description.en: A shared liquidity token on Gnosis Chain that provides liquidity for the tokens it's paired with and acts as an index token for those projects as well. Currently on Honeyswap and supporting 1Hive ($HNY), Token Engineering Commons ($TEC), BrightID ($BRIGHT), Giveth ($GIV), Shapeshift ($FOX), and Opolis ($WORK).
